title: Copper Output Disrupted at Strike-Hit Capstone Chile Mine
description: Production at a Capstone Copper Corp. mine in northern Chile has halted amid a nearly three-week labor strike, further tightening the global market. The company’s shares fell.
content: Production at a Capstone Copper Corp. mine in northern Chile has halted amid a nearly three-week labor strike, further tightening the global market. The company’s shares fell.
